participant_1.background:
I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning to start my day off right.
My family is really busy and we don't always have time to connect.
i work part time.
I enjoy photographing nature and my pets.
I don't have a car, but I do have a great reading nook in my house.

participant_2.background:
I love to support my local community by buying fresh produce from the farmers market.
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
I enjoy celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago.
i enjoy watching baseball.
my brother is currently couch surfing at my house.

content.text: Hey I'm glad we matched! I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning as well. How do you like yours?
Hey! I like mine with a little cream and sugar. I love starting my day off with a delicious cup of joe.
That sounds delicious! I usually drink mine black but I love adding cinnamon or vanilla sometimes.
I've never tried adding cinnamon to my coffee! That sounds like it would be delicious.
It is! It's a great way to add a little sweetness without adding sugar.
I'll have to try that next time I make coffee.
You definitely should! I also like to photograph nature and my pets. What are some of your hobbies?
I love to support my local community by buying fresh produce from the farmers market. I also love watching baseball and celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago.
That's awesome! I love supporting local businesses too. I've never been to Chicago for Thanksgiving but I hear it's a lot of fun.
It is! It's a great way to spend time with friends and family.
It sounds like you have a lot of great hobbies
